title: Brennero
overview: Bolzano, South Tyrol. Part of Italy, but here many speak German. It is a two-faced city, with citizens of German origin and those Italians, all equally shaken when a ruthless serial killer returns.Eva Kofler and Paolo Costa, Public Prosecutor and Inspector of different languages and cultures, hunt down a ruthless murderer who has returned to strike after years, reopening old wounds.
